title: Introducing:  Tiny Little Rocks
body:
We may have had a Thom Yorke record last year, it’s now been three years since the last Radiohead release and seven since their last release worthy of remembering.

With that in mind, Belgium’s **Tiny Little Rocks** serves to fill the void for the time being, with his In Rainbows indebted sound proving slightly uncompromising at times, whilst beautiful at others. The four tracks on his Soundcloud perhaps don’t show the greatest diversity of sound, there’s the Muse-esque post-rock build of _Again_, and the Weird Fishes styled _Break The Ice_, yet he carries both off with an admirable confidence. Check out _Give Me Up_ and _Again_ below, and head to his Soundcloud for more.

With that in mind, Belgium’s Tiny Little Rocks serves to fill the void for the time being, with his In Rainbows indebted sound proving slightly uncompromising \[…\]
